description:
Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP: Rhode Island Personal Injury Attorneys Providing Compassionate Representation

Few things in life are as physically, emotionally and financially taxing as going through a serious car, truck or other type of motor vehicle accident. For many people, the period after the accident is a stressful time as they go through treatment for injuries, must miss work as they recover, and are forced to stand by as medical bills and other accident-related expenses start to pile up.

At Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, our experienced team of personal injury attorneys has handled thousands of cases on behalf of individuals and families throughout Rhode Island. Since 1999, our firm's founders, Joseph P. Marasco and Donna M. Nesselbush, have dedicated their practice to helping real people resolve real problems. By working as a team, our attorneys and professional staff provide the intelligent, diligent and effective representation necessary to recover just compensation in the following matters:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Slip and fall as well as other premises liability
  • Social Security Disability
  • Wrongful death

Our goal is to pursue your interests first. When you sit down with us during a free initial consultation, we take the time to listen to your questions. After we have a clear picture of your situation, we will offer practical advice and strategy for helping you move forward. Throughout every step of the process, our staff operates with precision, kindness, honesty and determination.

To learn more about how we can help you, reach out to our law firm by contacting one of our seven offices. We are located in Providence, Wakefield, Warwick and Woonsocket, Rhode Island, as well as in Massachusetts and Connecticut.
